title: GFT 2023
description: The most complete hub of garment and textile manufacturing technologies and services. This year, on top of machines for garment subcontractors in the fashion industry, the event will expand to include machinery for sewing fertilizer bags for agricultural industry, car seat for automotive industry, interior fabric and leather fittings for furniture industry, and many more to unbox new possibilities for participants. Pre-register at https://bit.ly/GFT23_prereg_en.
